title: Application Developer
description: While still being relatively new to IBM, I've learnt a lot about web development and devops. Using IBM's training resources, I have been expanding my skillset to include technologies such as AWS, TensorFlow, React and Vue js.

title: Dev Ops Consultant
description: Although I was only in this role for a short time, I used this opportunity to gain experience in AWS, Azure and GCP. I also learnt about planning, creating and deploying pipelines to ensure code is properly tested, containerised and deployed to a large number of remote servers, without impacting current users.

title: BSc (Hons) Artificial Intelligence - First Class
description: During my time at DMU I studied all aspects of artificial intelligence. I specialised in autonomous robotics (detailed on projects page), and using the C++ programming language due to its speed and maleability.

title: BTEC Level 3 Extended Diploma in IT - D*D*D*
description: In college I learnt the basics of programming, web development, graphic design, game design and database creation and administration.
